issue.title: [R] Implement dplyr::bind_rows()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14414](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14414). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`pyarrow` has `concat_table()`, this could be implemented via ConcatenateTables (see https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-438)
